page.title: 01STOURPORT AND DISTRICT
page.content: This area consists mainly of farmland, woodland and residential parts.The farms are in parishes of Stourport-on-Severn,Rock,Ribbesford in Wyre Forest D.C.and Astley in Malvern Hills D.C.Farming is mainly arable with sheep and cattle.The woodland is in two main sections,the larger being part of Ribbesford Wood,controlled by the Forestry Commission.The smaller is Areley Wood,part of a private estate. The River Severn flows through the area,much used for fishing and pleasure boating. Caravan sites are situated on the banks. Streams such as Gladderbrook and Dick Brook run into the Severn through very attractive country-side. Stagborough Hill and Heightington are high points.
